Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
  com.brackeen.javagamebook.test.GameCore
      com.brackeen.javagamebook.tilegame.GameManager

public class GameManager
extends com.brackeen.javagamebook.test.GameCore

GameManager manages all parts of the game.

getTileCollision

public java.awt.Point getTileCollision(com.brackeen.javagamebook.graphics.Sprite sprite,
                                       float newX,
                                       float newY)
Gets the tile that a Sprites collides with. Only the Sprite's X or Y should be changed, not both. Returns null if no collision is detected.

Parameters:
sprite -
newX -
newY -
Returns:
Point
See Also:
TileMapRenderer.pixelsToTiles

isCollision

public boolean isCollision(com.brackeen.javagamebook.graphics.Sprite s1,
                           com.brackeen.javagamebook.graphics.Sprite s2)
Checks if two Sprites collide with one another. Returns false if the two Sprites are the same. Returns false if one of the Sprites is a Creature that is not alive.

Parameters:
Sprite -
Returns:
boolean

getSpriteCollision

public com.brackeen.javagamebook.graphics.Sprite getSpriteCollision(com.brackeen.javagamebook.graphics.Sprite sprite)
Gets the Sprite that collides with the specified Sprite, or null if no Sprite collides with the specified Sprite.

Returns:
Sprite

checkPlayerCollision

public void checkPlayerCollision(com.brackeen.javagamebook.tilegame.sprites.Player player,
                                 boolean canKill)
Checks for Player collision with other Sprites. If canKill is true, collisions with Creatures will kill them.
